# FixFX - FiveM & RedM Documentation Hub

> Comprehensive guides, tutorials, and documentation for FiveM, RedM, txAdmin, vMenu, and the CitizenFX ecosystem.

## About

FixFX is a documentation hub for the CitizenFX ecosystem, providing guides and resources for:
- FiveM (GTA V multiplayer modification)
- RedM (Red Dead Redemption 2 multiplayer modification)
- txAdmin (Server management panel)
- vMenu (In-game admin menu)
- Various roleplay frameworks (ESX, QBCore, Qbox, VORP)

## Main Sections

- [Documentation](/docs): Complete guides for FiveM, RedM, txAdmin, and frameworks
- [Artifacts](/artifacts): Download FiveM and RedM server files
- [Natives](/natives): Native function reference for FiveM and RedM development
- [Chat](/chat): AI assistant for FiveM/RedM development help
- [Blog](/blog): News and tutorials

## Documentation Topics

### txAdmin
- Installation and setup guides
- Server management
- Permissions system
- Discord bot integration
- Configuration editor
- Troubleshooting

### vMenu
- Installation guide
- Permissions configuration
- Menu customization
- Command reference

### Frameworks
- ESX Legacy setup
- QBCore installation
- Qbox framework
- VORP Core for RedM

### Guides
- Server optimization
- Resource development
- Lua scripting basics
- Database setup

## Technical Information

- Built with Next.js and Fumadocs
- Open source at github.com/CodeMeAPixel/FixFX
- API available for artifacts and natives data

## Contact

- GitHub: https://github.com/CodeMeAPixel
- Discord: https://discord.gg/cYauqJfnNK
